tasks.label: Build UX402_U2
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/UX402_U2/ux402-u2-approuter/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js ] || [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/UX402_U2/ux402-u2-approuter/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js ]; then npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock; fi

tasks.label: Build Master-Detail
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/Master-Detail/master-detail-approuter/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js ] || [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/Master-Detail/master-detail-approuter/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js ]; then npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock; fi

tasks.label: Build manageproducts
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/manageproducts/manageproducts-approuter/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js ] || [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/manageproducts/manageproducts-approuter/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js ]; then npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock; fi
